snippet: Companies have been told to buy and install hardware to log the traffic of computers, block selected Web sites and connect with local police servers.
abstract: Companies have been told to buy and install hardware to log the traffic of computers, block selected Web sites and connect with local police servers.
lead_paragraph: Companies have been told to buy and install hardware to log the traffic of computers, block selected Web sites and connect with local police servers. Read more »

headline.main: Chinese Authorities Pressure Businesses to Censor the Web
